title: Can you really make yourself smarter by just doing one thing consistently?

scenes.text: Can you really get smarter by doing just ONE thing?
scenes.visuals: Brain icon with question mark, dynamic background

scenes.text: Scientists studied thousands of people and found something shocking...
Reading for just 30 minutes daily increased cognitive function by 23%
scenes.visuals: Books, timer showing 30 min, brain getting brighter

scenes.text: Reading builds neural pathways, improves focus, and enhances memory. It's like exercise for your brain!
scenes.visuals: Brain with connecting neurons, books transforming into neural networks

scenes.text: Start with 10 minutes. Fiction, non-fiction, even articles count!
scenes.visuals: Various book types, clock, progress bar
Open book with glowing pages, subscribe button
